title: Leading eSports games worldwide 2019 , by tournament prize pool
yAxis: Total prize pool in million U.S. dollars
summary: This bar chart has 10 columns on the x axis representing Game Name, and Total prize pool in million U.S. dollars in each Game Name on the y axis.
The Total prize pool in million U.S. dollars is highest at Game Name Fortnite and lowest at Game Name Rainbow Six Siege.
The Total prize pool in million U.S. dollars of Game Name Rainbow Six Siege is 16.59% smaller than the maximum value at Fortnite.
min_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Total prize pool in million U.S. dollars for 10 number of Game Names.
The Total prize pool in million U.S. dollars is appeared to be the highest at Game Name Fortnite and lowest at Game Name Rainbow Six Siege.
mid_summary: This bar chart has 10 columns on the x axis representing Game Name, and Total prize pool in million U.S. dollars in each Game Name on the y axis.
The Total prize pool in million U.S. dollars is highest at Game Name Fortnite and lowest at Game Name Rainbow Six Siege.
The Total prize pool in million U.S. dollars of Game Name Rainbow Six Siege is 16.59% smaller than the maximum value at Fortnite.
max_summary: This is a bar chart representing Game Name in the x axis and Total prize pool in million U.S. dollars in the y axis.
The maximum Total prize pool in million U.S. dollars 64.37 is found at Game Name Fortnite and the minimum is found at Rainbow Six Siege where Game Name is 3.88.
The second highest Total prize pool in million U.S. dollars is appeared to be the Game Name DOTA 2.
The difference of Total prize pool in million U.S. dollars between the highest and lowest Game Name is 60.49.
Game Name Fortnite is higher than any other Game Names with value 64.37, followed by DOTA 2, and Counter-Strike: Global Offensive. Down to Game Name Rainbow Six Siege with the lowest value 3.88.
The lowest value 3.88 at Rainbow Six Siege is almost 3.59 times smaller than the average value 17.95.
